mapper.update:
update A_AGENT_COLINFO
AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLO_TYPE = #{cloType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLO_REALNAME = #{cloRealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLO_BANK = #{cloBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLO_BANK_BRANCH = #{cloBankBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLO_BANK_ACCOUNT = #{cloBankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_TIME = #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_UTIME = #{cUtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_USER = #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLO_REVIEW_STATUS = #{cloReviewStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VARSION = VARSION + 1 ,
BRANCH_LINE_NUM = #{branchLineNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALL_LINE_NUM = #{allLineNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_REGION = #{bankRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLO_TAX_POINT = #{cloTaxPoint,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLO_INVOICE = #{cloInvoice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLO_BANK_CODE = #{cloBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAY_STATUS = #{payStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AG_LEGAL_CERNUM = #{agLegalCernum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and VARSION = #{varsion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update A_AGENT_COLINFO set AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLO_TYPE = #{cloType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLO_REALNAME = #{cloRealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLO_BANK = #{cloBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLO_BANK_BRANCH = #{cloBankBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLO_BANK_ACCOUNT = #{cloBankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_TIME = #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, C_UTIME = #{cUtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_USER = #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLO_REVIEW_STATUS = #{cloReviewStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VARSION = VARSION + 1, BRANCH_LINE_NUM = #{branchLineNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALL_LINE_NUM = #{allLineNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_REGION = #{bankRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLO_TAX_POINT = #{cloTaxPoint,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLO_INVOICE = #{cloInvoice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLO_BANK_CODE = #{cloBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAY_STATUS = #{payStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AG_LEGAL_CERNUM = #{agLegalCernum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and VARSION = #{varsion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

mapper.sql: ac.ID, ac.AGENT_ID, ac.CLO_TYPE, ac.CLO_REALNAME, ac.CLO_BANK, ac.CLO_BANK_BRANCH, ac.CLO_BANK_ACCOUNT, ac.C_TIME, ac.C_UTIME, ac.REMARK, ac.C_USER, ac.CLO_REVIEW_STATUS, ac.STATUS,ac.VARSION, ac.BRANCH_LINE_NUM, ac.ALL_LINE_NUM
mapper.select:
select
from A_AGENT_COLINFO where AGENT_ID=#{id} and STATUS = 1

select
from A_agent_businfo ab,A_agent_colinfo_rel acr,A_agent_colinfo ac where ab.id = acr.agentbusid and acr.agent_colinfoid = ac.id and ab.id = #{busId} and ac.status=1
select ac.agent_id from a_agent_colinfo ac where ac.clo_review_status=3 and ac.status=1 group by ac.agent_id having count(*) > 1
mapper.sql: C.ID, C.AGENT_ID, C.CLO_TYPE, C.CLO_REALNAME, C.CLO_BANK, C.CLO_BANK_BRANCH, C.CLO_BANK_ACCOUNT, C.C_TIME, C.C_UTIME, C.REMARK, C.C_USER, C.CLO_REVIEW_STATUS, C.STATUS, C.VARSION, C.BRANCH_LINE_NUM, C.ALL_LINE_NUM, C.BANK_REGION, C.CLO_TAX_POINT, C.CLO_INVOICE, C.CLO_BANK_CODE, C.PAY_STATUS, C.AG_LEGAL_CERNUM
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM A_AGENT_COLINFO C, A_AGENT A WHERE A.ID = C.AGENT_ID AND C.CLO_REVIEW_STATUS=3 AND A.AG_STATUS = 'Approved' AND C.STATUS = '1' AND A.STATUS = '1' AND A.ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
